00018 #ifndef TLM_SLAVE_SOCKET_H
00019 #define TLM_SLAVE_SOCKET_H
00020 
00021 #include "tlm_h/tlm_annotated/tlm_fw_bw_ifs/tlm_fw_bw_ifs.h"
00022 //#include <systemc.h>
00023 
00024 using tlm_annotated::tlm_fw_nb_transport_if;
00025 using tlm_annotated::tlm_bw_nb_transport_if;
00026 
00027 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH,
00028           typename FW_IF,
00029           typename BW_IF> class tlm_master_socket;
00030 
00031 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00032           typename FW_IF = tlm_fw_nb_transport_if<>,
00033           typename BW_IF = tlm_bw_nb_transport_if<> >
00034 class tlm_slave_socket : public sc_export<FW_IF>
00035 {
00036 public:
00037   typedef FW_IF fw_interface_type;
00038   typedef BW_IF bw_interface_type;
00039   typedef sc_port<bw_interface_type> port_type;
00040   typedef sc_export<fw_interface_type> export_type;
00041   typedef tlm_master_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00042                             fw_interface_type,
00043                             bw_interface_type> master_socket_type;
00044 
00045   friend class tlm_master_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00046                                  fw_interface_type,
00047                                  bw_interface_type>;
00048 
00049 public:
00050   tlm_slave_socket(const char* name) :
00051     export_type(name)
00052   {
00053   }
00054 
00055   unsigned int get_bus_width() const
00056   {
00057     return BUSWIDTH;
00058   }
00059 
00060   //
00061   // Bind slave socket to master socket
00062   // - Binds the port of the master socket to the export of the slave socket
00063   // - Binds the port of the slave socket to the export of the master socket
00064   //
00065   void bind(master_socket_type& s)
00066   {
00067     // master.port -> slave.export
00068     (*static_cast<typename master_socket_type::port_type*>(&s))(*static_cast<export_type*>(this));
00069     // slave.port -> master.export
00070     mPort(s.mExport);
00071   }
00072 
00073   void operator() (master_socket_type& s)
00074   {
00075     bind(s);
00076   }
00077 
00078   //
00079   // Bind slave socket to slave socket (hierarchical bind)
00080   // - Binds both the export and the port
00081   //
00082   void bind(tlm_slave_socket& s)
00083   {
00084     // export
00085     (*static_cast<export_type*>(this))(*static_cast<export_type*>(s));
00086     // port
00087     mPort(s.mPort);
00088   }
00089 
00090   void operator() (tlm_slave_socket& s)
00091   {
00092     bind(s);
00093   }
00094 
00095   //
00096   // Bind interface to socket
00097   // - Binds the interface to the export
00098   //
00099   void bind(fw_interface_type& ifs)
00100   {
00101     (*static_cast<export_type*>(this))(ifs);
00102   }
00103 
00104   void operator() (fw_interface_type& s)
00105   {
00106     bind(s);
00107   }
00108 
00109   //
00110   // Forward to 'operator->()' of port class
00111   //
00112   bw_interface_type* operator->()
00113   {
00114     return mPort.operator->();
00115   }
00116 
00117 protected:
00118   port_type mPort;
00119 };
00120 
00121 #endif
